title: Taste Of Jasmine: AMBW Romance
description: He's Gotta Have It. Busan, South Korea - Jasmine is a talented, world-renowned pastry chef, and her tasty creations are desired by many. She is determined not to let her family recipes fall into the wrong hands, but a family emergency forces her into a compromising position. Chen-Li is a handsome Korean business owner whose parents feel it is time for him to settle down. They’re not above fixing him up with a woman with the preferred credentials - good family, the best education, and equally beneficial business connections. But a dull, lifeless partnership is the last thing Chen-Li is willing to settle for. Chemistry must be on the menu. “Taste of Jasmine is mouth watering, sizzling, chemical reaction of romance…” Taste of Jasmine is a steamy office romance with a guaranteed HEA featuring a Beautiful Black Professional Woman and a Sexy Professional Asian Man. No cheating, and no cliffhangers. Heat For mature audiences only. If you love novellas filled with detailed, hot, steamy encounters of the best kind, then you will love “Taste of Jasmine”. #AMBWLOVE
author: Love Journey
